name: subs-prompt-generator
description: Legal submissions prompt generator with comprehensive testing and debugging

scripts.test:security: npm run test:security:audit && npm run test:security:lint
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:security
scripts.test:quick-check: npm run test:unit && npm run lint
scripts.test:health: npm run test:quick-check && echo '✅ Health check passed!'
scripts.test:visual: npm run serve & sleep 3 && npm run test:e2e -- --project=chromium && killall node
scripts.accessibility: lighthouse http://localhost:8080 --only-categories=accessibility --output=json --output-path=./reports/accessibility.json && echo 'Accessibility report saved to reports/accessibility.json'
scripts.setup: npm install && npx playwright install && echo '✅ Setup complete! Run: npm run test:health'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules coverage test-results reports && echo '🧹 Cleaned up test artifacts'
scripts.doctor: npm run test:health && npm run validate && echo '🏥 System diagnosis complete'
